name: tm71
effect: Teaches Stone Edge to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Stone Edge to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.black_white: The user stabs the foe with sharpened stones from below. It has a high critical-hit ratio.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user stabs the foe with sharpened stones from below. It has a high critical-hit ratio.
